Flying Whenever Beacon Hawk deals combat damage to a player, you may untap target creature.  White  : Beacon Hawk gets +0/+1 until end of turn. Draw a card for each creature target player controls, then draw a card for each creature another target player controls. Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each of its colors. (  Tap  : Add   Black   or   Red   to your mana pool.) As Blood Crypt enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Blood Crypt enters the battlefield tapped. As an additional cost to cast Bond of Agony, pay X life. Each other player loses X life. Other spells you control can't be countered by spells or abilities this turn. Draw a card. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target multicolored creature this turn. For each 1 damage prevented this way, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature. Choose a nonland card name. Target player reveals his or her hand. That player discards a card with that name. If he or she can't, you draw a card. (  Tap  : Add   Green   or   Blue   to your mana pool.) As Breeding Pool enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Breeding Pool enters the battlefield tapped. When a player other than Bronze Bombshell's owner controls it, that player sacrifices it. If the player does, Bronze Bombshell deals 7 damage to him or her. Cackling Flames deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Hellbent — Cackling Flames deals 5 damage to that creature or player instead if you have no cards in hand. The next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn is dealt to another target creature instead. Draw a card. Flying Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. When Coiling Oracle enters the battlefield, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand. Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness. Vigilance When Court Hussar enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library, then put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. When Court Hussar enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless   White   was spent to cast it. Destroy each artifact, creature, and enchantment with converted mana cost X. When Crypt Champion enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless   Red   was spent to cast it. If a spell or ability would cause its controller to gain life, that player loses that much life instead. First strike  Tap  : Reveal your hand and discard a card of target opponent's choice. Then that player reveals his or her hand and discards a card of your choice. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. Rakdos Carnarium enters the battlefield tapped. Trample When Aurochs Herd enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Aurochs card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library. Whenever Aurochs Herd attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs. Whenever Balduvian Fallen's cumulative upkeep is paid, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each   Black   or   Red   spent this way.  Blue  ,   Tap  : Target snow land becomes a 2/2 blue Elemental creature with flying. It's still a land. Target attacking creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.  Tap  : Remove target blocking creature from combat. Creatures it was blocking that hadn't become blocked by another creature this combat become unblocked, then it blocks an attacking creature of your choice. Activate this ability only during the declare blockers step. Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. When enchanted creature is dealt damage, destroy it. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Flying Rimefeather Owl's power and toughness are each equal to the number of snow permanents on the battlefield.  1   Snow  : Put an ice counter on target permanent. Permanents with ice counters on them are snow. Trample Whenever Rimehorn Aurochs attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs.  2   Snow  : Target creature blocks target creature this turn if able.  (  Snow   can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.) Flying  2   Snow  : Tap target creature and put an ice counter on it.  (  Snow   can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.) Creatures with ice counters on them don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.  1  ,   Tap  : Counter target activated ability. Activate this ability only if you control four or more snow permanents.  (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)  1  ,   Tap  : You may tap or untap target permanent. Activate this ability only if you control four or more snow permanents. Add   Red   Red   to your mana pool, then add   Red   to your mana pool for each card named Rite of Flame in each graveyard. Protection from snow Cumulative upkeep   1    (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Ronom Serpent can't attack unless defending player controls a snow land. When you control no snow lands, sacrifice Ronom Serpent. Sacrifice Ronom Unicorn: Destroy target enchantment. (  Snow   can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.) Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, create a 3/1 black and red Graveborn creature token with haste. Enchant creature When Shape of the Wiitigo enters the battlefield, put six +1/+1 counters on enchanted creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature if it attacked or blocked since your last upkeep. Otherwise, remove a +1/+1 counter from it. Trample None Discard a land card: Simian Brawler gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Skred deals damage to target creature equal to the number of snow permanents you control. G U R W B You may exile two black cards from your hand rather than pay Soul Spike's mana cost. Soul Spike deals 4 damage to target creature or player and you gain 4 life. Creatures it was blocking that hadn't become blocked by another creature this combat become unblocked, then it blocks an attacking creature of your choice. Activate this ability only during the declare blockers step. Blue  ,   Tap  : Target snow land becomes a 2/2 blue Elemental creature with flying. It's still a land. Target attacking creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.  Tap  : Remove target blocking creature from combat. Creatures it was blocking that hadn't become blocked by another creature this combat become unblocked, then it blocks an attacking creature of your choice. Activate this ability only during the declare blockers step. Flying Whenever Blizzard Specter deals combat damage to a player, choose one — • That player returns a permanent he or she controls to its owner's hand. • That player discards a card. Snow   can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.) If a creature would deal combat damage to you and/or one or more creatures you control, prevent X of that damage, where X is the number of age counters on Cover of Winter. Whenever you're dealt damage, you may create that many 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. Dark Depths enters the battlefield with ten ice counters on it.  3  : Remove an ice counter from Dark Depths. Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. When enchanted creature is dealt damage, destroy it. You may exile two red cards from your hand rather than pay Fury of the Horde's mana cost. Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Tap  : Pirate Ship deals 1 damage to target creature or player. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Pirate Ship.  Tap  : Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Psionic Blast deals 4 damage to target creature or player and 2 damage to you. Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Sacred Mesa unless you sacrifice a Pegasus.  1   White  : Create a 1/1 white Pegasus creature token with flying.  2  ,   Tap  : Exile target creature you control. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice Safe Haven. If you do, return each card exiled with Safe Haven to the battlefield under its owner's control. Scragnoth can't be countered. Protection from blue When Sengir Autocrat enters the battlefield, create three 0/1 black Serf creature tokens. When Sengir Autocrat leaves the battlefield, exile all Serf tokens. Serrated Arrows enters the battlefield with three arrowhead counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are no arrowhead counters on Serrated Arrows, sacrifice it.  Tap  , Remove an arrowhead counter from Serrated Arrows: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.  Blue  ,   Tap  : Put target creature you control on top of its owner's library.  Red  ,   Tap  : Shadow Guildmage deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to you. None Whenever Shadowmage Infiltrator deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.  Tap  : Draw a card and reveal it. If it isn't a land card, discard it. None Whenever a player casts a black spell, you gain 1 life. Otherwise, each creature blocking or blocked by Spitting Slug gains first strike until end of turn.  2  , Discard a card at random: Stormbind deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Flying White spells and black spells you cast cost   1   less to cast. Target opponent discards a card at random, then discards a card. As The Rack enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. At the beginning of the chosen player's upkeep, The Rack deals X damage to that player, where X is 3 minus the number of cards in his or her hand. Flashback   3   Green    (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.) Lands you control are Plains. Nonland permanents you control are white. The same is true for spells you control and nonland cards you own that aren't on the battlefield. You may spend white mana as though it were mana of any color. You may spend other mana only as though it were colorless mana.  1  , Sacrifice a permanent: You gain 1 life. You win the game if you control a land of each basic land type and a creature of each color. Flying Whenever Cockatrice blocks or becomes blocked by a non-Wall creature, destroy that creature at end of combat. Enchant land Enchanted land has indestructible and can't be enchanted by other Auras. As Conspiracy enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creatures you control are the chosen type. The same is true for creature spells you control and creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield. Trample None Dandân can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Dandân. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. None Dauthi Slayer attacks each combat if able. Then shuffle your library.  Tap  : Add   Colorless   to your mana pool.  Tap  : Desert deals 1 damage to target attacking creature. Activate this ability only during the end of combat step. Kicker   White   White    (You may pay an additional   White   White   as you cast this spell.) When Desolation Giant enters the battlefield, destroy all other creatures you control. If it was kicked, destroy all other creatures instead. Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Disintegrate deals X damage to target creature or player. That creature can't be regenerated this turn. If the creature would die this turn, exile it instead. If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Dodecapod, put it onto the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it instead of putting it into your graveyard. Flying  Red  : Dragon Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If this ability has been activated four or more times this turn, sacrifice Dragon Whelp at the beginning of the next end step. Search your library for a Dragon permanent card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library. None Play with your hand revealed. If you would draw a card, reveal the top card of your library instead. If it's a creature card, put it into your graveyard. Otherwise, draw a card. When Faceless Butcher leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.  Tap  , Exile Feldon's Cane: Shuffle your graveyard into your library. When Gaea's Blessing is put into your graveyard from your library, shuffle your graveyard into your library. As long as Gaea's Liege isn't attacking, its power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control. Flying  Blue   Blue   Blue  : Regenerate Ghost Ship. You may choose not to untap Giant Oyster during your untap step.  Tap  : For as long as Giant Oyster remains tapped, target tapped creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step, and at the beginning of each of your draw steps, put a -1/-1 counter on that creature. When Giant Oyster leaves the battlefield or becomes untapped, remove all -1/-1 counters from the creature. Tap  : Goblin Snowman deals 1 damage to target creature it's blocking.  2  ,   Tap  , Sacrifice Grinning Totem: Search target opponent's library for a card and exile it. Then that player shuffles his or her library. Until the beginning of your next upkeep, you may play that card. At the beginning of your next upkeep, if you haven't played it, put it into its owner's graveyard. Hail Storm deals 2 damage to each attacking creature and 1 damage to you and each creature you control. The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature or player this turn, prevent that damage. If damage from a red source is prevented this way, Honorable Passage deals that much damage to the source's controller. You may spend other mana only as though it were colorless mana. Search your library for an artifact or enchantment card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it. At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy all artifacts and enchantments. They can't be regenerated. Each player sacrifices the creature he or she controls with the highest converted mana cost unless he or she pays that creature's mana cost. If two or more creatures a player controls are tied for highest cost, that player chooses one. Sacrifice Resistance Fighter: Prevent all combat damage target creature would deal this turn. Each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library. You exile the top ten cards of your library. Then each player draws up to seven cards.
